Package edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.manager

Class TrailManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.manager.TrailManager
public class TrailManager extends Object
Class for managing trails. Finds distances to different destinations, as well as finding potential first aid locations
Author:
Jeremiah Knizley

  • Constructor Details

    • TrailManager

      public TrailManager(String pathToLandmarkFile, String pathToTrailFile) throws FileNotFoundException
      Creates a TrailManager. trails are initialized to an ArrayBasedList landmarks are initialized to an ArrayBasedList
      Parameters:
      pathToLandmarkFile - the path to the file containing landmarks
      pathToTrailFile - the path to the file containing trails
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if one of the files cannot be found

  • Method Details

    • getDistancesToDestinations

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.map.Map<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Landmark,Integer> getDistancesToDestinations(String originLandmark)
      Returns a map to different landmarks from an originLandmark. Only trails that connect to a landmark are included in the map that is returned.
      Parameters:
      originLandmark - the landmark to calculate distances from
      Returns:
      A map containing a list of landmarks that connect to originlandmark, and their distances.

    • getLandmarkByID

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Landmark getLandmarkByID(String landmarkID)
      Finds a landmark in the landmarks list and returns it.
      Parameters:
      landmarkID - the ID of the landmark to search for.
      Returns:
      the landmark in from the list, or null if empty.

    • getProposedFirstAidLocations

      public edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.map.Map<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Landmark,edu.ncsu.csc316.dsa.list.List<edu.ncsu.csc316.trail.data.Trail>> getProposedFirstAidLocations(int numberOfIntersectingTrails)
      Finds Potential locations for first aid stations based on the minimum number of intersecting trails.
      Parameters:
      numberOfIntersectingTrails - the minimum number of intersecting trails required for a first aid station.
      Returns:
      a map containing Landmarks and List of trails as keys and values respectively. For a Landmark, the list of intersecting trails are listed.
